Authors: Suprayogi M.N., Ratriana L., Wulandari A.P.J.
Title: The interplay of academic efficacy and goal orientation toward academic achievement
Affiliations: Psychology Department, Faculty of Humanities, Bina Nusantara University, Jakarta, 11480, Indonesia
Authors with affiliations: Suprayogi, M.N., Psychology Department, Faculty of Humanities, Bina Nusantara University, Jakarta, 11480, Indonesia; Ratriana, L., Psychology Department, Faculty of Humanities, Bina Nusantara University, Jakarta, 11480, Indonesia; Wulandari, A.P.J., Psychology Department, Faculty of Humanities, Bina Nusantara University, Jakarta, 11480, Indonesia
Abstract: This study was aimed to examine the interplay of academic efficacy, goal orientation toward academic achievement. 199 first and second year university students in Indonesia were selected as respondents. The Pattern of Adaptive Learning Scales (PALS) was used to measure the academic efficacy and goal orientation. The finding revealed that mastery goal orientation is a considerable factor for academic achievement. This finding can be used in the context of improving educational quality achievement in Indonesia. © Published under licence by IOP Publishing Ltd.
Author Keywords: Academic achievement; Academic efficacy; Goal orientation
Index Keywords: Academic achievements; Academic efficacy; Adaptive learning; Educational qualities; Goal orientations; Indonesia; University students; Physics
